name: Project Invaders (Alpha)
description:
I'm a one man team working on all the assets and coding that goes into the game. The development may take a while as I can only do this so long as I have free time to dedicate to it. I made this mostly to show case the skills I learned about game development and 3D modelling and animation. This project gave me reasons to learn more techniques and efficient work practices in these fields. E-mail me your comments and suggestions if you can, it will truly be a great help! Also follow me here on itch.io, I will post weekly updates and progress to the development.

Contact: leonardo.regalado9@gmail.com
